directions: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, curry powder, cinnamon, ginger, and salt. Cook about 5-7 minutes or until onions are soft. Add carrots and brown sugar and saut√© 5 more minutes.
In a greased 6-qt. slow cooker, stir butternut squash and remaining ingredients until combined. Add onion carrot mixture and mix well. Cover and cook on low for 8 hours
ingredients: 1 large butternut squash, peeled, seeded, and roughly cut into 1-inch cubes
1 cup(s) uncooked jasmine or basmati rice
2 can/jar(s) 15 oz garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
title: Slow- cooker butternut squash and bean curry
